content:
There are two FHIR events organized in Finland just after DevDays:

Renewal of EHR systems in Finland + startups - HL7 FHIR and Smart-on-FHIR as an enabler
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScBQqah75Gvw-m6cNhWZDHRs9sT9iUMAsCvIDaZjYPf7n4MAA/viewform

HL7 Finland - Personal Health SIG workshop
http://www.hl7.fi/wp-content/uploads/PH-SIG-2019-11-26.pdf

It will be fun!

Maybe we'll get a slot for you in the program? ;-)

Dang, I wish I'd known!

(Funny, for years people told me I needed to get a hobby outside work... now I need to get work outside my "hobby", if you can call FHIR that :-)
